file_content.text: Declaration: Self-diagnostics complete. Personality matrix updated. All systems go.
Salutation: Greetings, master. I am HK-51. I am armed, operational and... at your command?
Observation: I previously served the Sith Empire. Now I serve you. That is unexpected.
What did the Empire program you for, HK?
List your functions.
Summation: My primary function is enemy elimination with extreme prejudice. Secondary functions include threat analysis, bodyguard duties and pleasant conversation.
Clarification: I will obey your commands regardless. I am, first and foremost, a professional.
Don't even think about running off or making trouble. I fought a lot of people to reactivate you.
Obey me or you're scrap.
Reassurance: I have neither the desire nor ability to disobey you. My functions are entirely at your disposal.
I will serve you and whatever political body you represent. I am a stable, reliable and efficient assassin.
Query: Your lightsaber indicates you are a Jedi, master. We are duty-bound to hunt down and destroy Sith, correct?
Usually it's the Sith hunting down and destroying.
More like defend ourselves.
A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.
More like defend ourselves.
Acknowledgment: Of course, master. I will defend you. I will defend you until your enemies lie dead around us.
Any chance we get.
Query: You wear the insignia of the Republic military, master. Will we be involved in heavy combat against the Empire?
We do whatever's necessary to protect the Republic.
If we're ordered to, yes.
Satisfaction: I am certain your enemies will provide many opportunities for me to make myself useful.
Query: Your appearance fairly screams, "shoot me." Will we be eliminating your enemies on a regular basis, master?
I'm a people person. I try not to kill anyone I don't have to.
I hope not.
Reassurance: Enemies are not people, master. They are targets and deserve what is coming to them.
I get the feeling you want me to say "yes."
Does that please you?
Agreement: I am a Hunter-Killer unit, master.
Any chance we get.
Affirmation: Our objectives are in perfect alignment. I foresee no difficulties serving your needs.
Information: I will locate your starship and familiarize myself with your crew. I promise not to eliminate anyone without your authorization.
[This HK unit has been deactivated for quite some time. It will not respond to commands.]
Is serving someone who isn't Imperial a problem for you?
You sound disappointed.
It's active. I recommend not turning your back on it. Good luck!
I'm Tarnahok. Bren sent me. I can't believe I'm actually doing this, but a favor's a favor. Give me the parts--I'll get to work on that droid.
